short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A chrome extension that makes it easier to deal with so many tabs.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
What this extension does:
This extension displays all currently opened tabs on the NewTab, grouped by domain name, making it easier for you to find the tabs you want.

Why:
Sometimes we have a lot of tabs open and more tabs open all the time, and we just donâ€™t want to close them. Before long, it will be difficult for us to find the tab page we want, because all the tabs become small icons crowded in the tab bar.

This extension makes it easier to deal with so many tabs.

--------------------------------------------------
# Changelog
## 5.1.6
- Reload data when switching back to the NewTab.
- Fixed some bugs.

## 5.1.5
- You can close duplicate tabs with one click.
- Tabs can be viewed as groups according to Chrome's tab groups.
- Fixed some bugs.

## 5.1.1
- Automatically close duplicated NewTabs.

## 5.1.3
- Displays the pathname of tab URL below each tab title.

## 5.1.4
- You can remove duplicate tabs.
